00012 #include <Qt>
00013 #include <QLabel>
00014 #include <QPixmap>
00015 #include <QPushButton>
00016 #include <QGridLayout>
00017 
00018 #include "stkmessage.h"
00019 
00020 StkMessage::StkMessage(const QPixmap & pixmap, const QString & text, QWidget *parent) :
00021     StkWidget(parent)
00022 {
00023     // create widgets
00024     // main icon
00025     mIcon = new QLabel(this);
00026     mIcon->setPixmap(pixmap);
00027     // main text message
00028     mText = new QLabel(text, this);
00029     // end session button
00030     mEndButton = new QPushButton("End",this);
00031 
00032     // layout widgets
00033     // grid layout 2x2
00034     QGridLayout *grid = new QGridLayout(this);
00035     // main icon topleft
00036     grid->addWidget(mIcon,0,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00037     // end session button topright
00038     grid->addWidget(mEndButton,0,1,Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
00039     // main text message middle left
00040     grid->addWidget(mText,1,0,1,2,Qt::AlignHCenter);
00041 
00042     // connect signals
00043     connect(mEndButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SIGNAL(endSession()));
00044 }
00045 
00046 StkMessage::~StkMessage()
00047 {
00048     close();
00049     delete mText;
00050     delete mIcon;
00051     delete mEndButton;
00052 }
